abstract: Russia and China vetoed a U.N. resolution calling for an end to violence in Syria and were accused of turning their backs on the Syrian people. Our colleague Joan Nassivera meanwhile reports that Syrian government forces sent a barrage of mortar shells and heavy machine-gun fire raining down on Homs, reportedly killing at least 200.

headline.main: Bloodshed and Hardship in Syria and a U.N. Veto
